conbody.p: (a) Documents to assist with Contractor Performance Assessment Reporting System (CPARS) to include the DISA CPARS Procedures are located at https://dod365.sharepoint-mil.us/sites/disa-PL2/SitePages/PL2-CPARS.aspx. Current Guidance for CPARS and the User Manual are available at https://www.cpars.gov/help.htm .
